name: Patient Access Solutions
overview: Patient Access Solutions, Inc. provides healthcare information technology solutions to physician practices, hospitals, medical centers, clinics, and insurance payers. The company offers PASHealth Web Portal System, a Web-based ASP platform for electronic medical verification and claims processing. Its services include D-PAS, which utilizes a digital pen and paper to capture handwritten information, transfers it into a digital form, and utilizes the data to initiate workflows in a secure environment; Claims Analyzer, a claims processing system; a payment processing solution for the receipt of patient self pay receivables; and Eligibility verification solutions for the assessment and verification of patient benefits coverage for timely reimbursement. The companyâ€™s services also include PAS Prescription Center, a clinical management suite that acts as a clinical hub to join users to pharmacies through Internet; an electronic medical record solution that allows healthcare providers to manage patient information and access patient records in-house or remotely; and Mobipen, a tool for registering various types of documentation for the home healthcare industry. It serves customers in medical, dental, home healthcare, chiropractic, and veterinary industries. Patient Access Solutions, Inc. was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Hauppauge, New York.
